PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-13532007-09-18,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
PrecisOrder Amending PART I of SCHEDULE I to the HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS ACT (FLAME RESISTANCE TEST METHOD) by replacing the references to an English-only U.S. standard for testing the flammability of certain textiles with references to an equivalent, up-to-date bilingual standard developed by the Canadian General Standards Board.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0205 Publication Date: 2007-10-03
AttachmentsAttachment
